Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-43357 affecting package libsass for versions less than 3.6.6-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-43357 affecting package libsass for versions less than 3.6.6-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libsass is earlier than 3.6.6-1, affected by CVE-2022-43357
